data.name: Retro Classix: Super BurgerTime
data.detailed_description:
The 2-player sequel to the classic BurgerTime!

You are Peter Pepper Jr., son of legendary chef Peter Pepper from the classic arcade game BurgerTime. In this new adventure, you and your twin brother Pete Pepper Jr. (in two-player mode) must outmaneuver and outwit enemies while cooking delicious burgers.

Run through each maze-like level jumping on burger ingredients to add them together, but watch out for Mr. Hot Dog, Mr. Egg and the dangerous Mr. Pickle who will try to stop you. Arm yourself with offensive weapons like the pepper cellar, or defensive items like a cape to help you defeat your enemies and make your way to the final boss.

  • Play alongside a friend in two-player mode (requires at least one controller)
  • Play with original rendering or reproduce the look of an arcade cabinet with a CRT-style view

The 2-player sequel to the classic BurgerTime!

You are Peter Pepper Jr., son of legendary chef Peter Pepper from the classic arcade game BurgerTime. In this new adventure, you and your twin brother Pete Pepper Jr. (in two-player mode) must outmaneuver and outwit enemies while cooking delicious burgers.

Run through each maze-like level jumping on burger ingredients to add them together, but watch out for Mr. Hot Dog, Mr. Egg and the dangerous Mr. Pickle who will try to stop you. Arm yourself with offensive weapons like the pepper cellar, or defensive items like a cape to help you defeat your enemies and make your way to the final boss.

data.short_description: The 2-player sequel to the classic BurgerTime! In Super BurgerTime, play as Peter Pepper Jr. and complete the burgers, but watch out for Mr. Hot Dog, Mr. Egg and the dangerous Mr. Pickle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Graphics Device
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 281 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Up to 2 players local co-op (requires at least one controller)
